text: kisee manushy ke lie yah sambhav na tha ki allaah use kitaab aur hikamat (tatvadarshita) aur paigambaree pradaan kare aur vah logon se kahane lage, "tum allaah ko chhodakar mere upaasak bano." balki vah to yahee kahega ki, "tum rabavaale bano, isalie ki tum kitaab kee shiksha dete ho aur isalie ki tum svayan bhee padhate ho.
